alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Mathews; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued September 27 at 9:05PM EDT until September 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to two feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Gloucester, Mathews and York Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Widespread flooding of vulnerable areas will result in an elevated threat of property damage to homes and businesses near the waterfront and shoreline. Water will be 1 to 2 feet above ground level in some areas resulting in a sufficient depth to close numerous roads and threaten homes and businesses. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays resulting in some road closures and flooding of vehicles. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/08 PM 4.9 2.2 2.2 1 MINOR 28/09 AM 4.8 2.1 2.0 1 MINOR 28/09 PM 4.7 2.0 2.0 1 MINOR 29/10 AM 4.6 1.9 1.7 1 MINOR 29/10 PM 4.0 1.3 1.3 1 NONE 30/11 AM 4.4 1.7 1.4 1 NONE YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/09 PM 5.0 2.4 1.9 1 MODERATE 28/09 AM 4.8 2.2 1.7 1 MINOR 28/09 PM 4.9 2.3 1.7 1 MINOR 29/10 AM 4.6 2.0 1.3 1 MINOR 29/10 PM 4.1 1.5 1.0 1 NONE 30/11 AM 4.4 1.8 1.0 1 NONE WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/10 PM 3.5 2.1 1.7 1 MODERATE 28/10 AM 3.4 2.0 1.6 1 MINOR 28/11 PM 3.4 2.0 1.6 1 MINOR 29/11 AM 3.1 1.7 1.2 1 MINOR 29/11 PM 2.7 1.3 1.0 1 NONE 30/12 PM 2.7 1.3 0.7 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
